source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Rock Tumbling 101
items.headline: Learn How to Polish Stones from Start to Finish
objectives_summary: Geting started tumbling and polishing rocks and gemstones.

items.title: How to Draw A Manga / Anime Styled Portrait - Drawing Course
items.headline: Learn the basics of Anime / Manga styled portrait drawing quickly!
objectives_summary: How to draw a Manga / Anime styled portrait
How to draw the head in a simple and easy way
How to draw the eyes, nose and mouth and where to place them!

items.title: How to Draw an Orc - Drawing Cartoon Animation Course
items.headline: Drawing Fantasy Lesson
objectives_summary: How to Draw
How to Draw an Orc
How to Draw Fantasy Art

items.title: Acrylic Painting for Beginners and Intermediates
items.headline: Learn How to Paint Beautiful Colors on Canvas with Acrylic Paint
objectives_summary: Adding shadows and highlights to acrylic paintings
Creating a background color for acrylic paintings
Mixing colors

items.title: The Beauty of Portrait Drawing - The Front  View.
items.headline: From Italy with Love
objectives_summary: Skull anatomy.
The muscles of the head.
A tridimensional, simplified outline, that can be used anytime to draw the human head with ease.

items.title: Paint WET into WET in watercolors. Loosen up & paint boldly.

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Take your watercolor painting to the next level by mastering a wet into wet technique.  Add drama and life to your work
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint wet into wet with watercolours and use a BIG brush.
Learn how to paint a fluid floral watercolour painting.
Learn how to go straight to a blank piece of paper and start with a wet pale watercolour wash.

items.title: How to Draw Arms - Arm Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: How to Draw People Step by Step - The Easy Way I Human body
objectives_summary: How to Draw
How to Draw Arms
How to Draw People

items.title: Watercolour for beginners #1
items.headline: The basics you need to know for success.
objectives_summary: You will learn what paint to use.
You will learn to choose the right brush.
You will learn all about watercolour paper

items.headline: Learn basic drawing skills in a fun way
objectives_summary: basic drawing skills
character design
creature design

items.title: How to Use Water-Soluble Graphite - 6 Course Drawing Bundle!
items.headline: Learn how to use Aquarelle Graphite Pencils to draw pictures then wet them to create stunning effects. 6 Courses in 1!
objectives_summary: How To Use Water-Soluble Graphite Pencils
How to create depth using multiple graphite tones
How to draw and shade a variety of subjects

items.title: Still Life Oil Painting for Beginners
items.headline: Still life painting, the easy methods and professional quality
objectives_summary: The students will get a 11x14 beautiful still life painting, meanwhile, they will get the solid practical oil painting experience

items.title: Learn & paint a watercolor in 6 FUN & EASY to follow steps.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Just look over my shoulder and follow me as I take you step by step to plan, draw and paint this French village scene.
objectives_summary: Understand a planning process for a watercolour painting.
Learn to make a watercolour composition interesting
Understand the benefits of using a limited watercolour colour palette

items.title: Free-Hand Draw Cartoons with Colin Bradley
items.headline: Learn how to free hand draw 16 cartoons with a graphite pencil and colour using colouring pencils.
objectives_summary: Have a set of fun cartoons they can be proud of
Understand the techniques for drawing free hand cartoons
Learn how to use colouring pencils to colour cartoons effectively

items.title: Traditional Painting - Principles & Methods for Realism
items.headline: Learn the History, Fundamentals and Methods, Materials and Production of Traditional Realistic Drawings and Paintings
objectives_summary: Principles e Methods of Traditional Realist Painting
History of Painting and Classic Academicism
The Functioning of an Atelier/Studio of Realist Academic Painting

items.title: Sewing and Making Handbag: Leather Shoulder Bag and Wallet
items.headline: A Complete Course about Making Leather Shoulder Bag and Wallet, Zipped Pockets and Sizable Straps From Scratch, Handbag
objectives_summary: Introducing the different kinds of leather
Introducing the tools of leather work and how to use them
Different kinds of stitches on leather

items.title: Hand Embroidery For Beginners
items.headline: I will take you through the technique step by step and show you just how easy it can be
objectives_summary: During this class, you are going to create your own project using needle painting! This will be achieved by stitching along with me in the video tutorial.
